"The Subpalette":
"About the Subpalette

The Subpalette is used to equip class skills, Techniques, items, ring skills and Photon Blasts. Select a slot to display a list of items that you can equip in it.

Choosing an item from the list equips it in the selected slot. Your selection will be applied to your character when you go back to the previous window.
